spec_data.Name: kurdit-unikurd-web-fonts
spec_data.Description:
A widely used Kurdish font which supports various Arabic-like scripts
(Arabic, Kurdish, Persian) and also Latin.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 26 Jul 2017 10:23:28 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A widely used Kurdish font for Arabic-like scripts and Latin
